Key Match Events: White Sox won 4-3 in a walk-off victory in the 10th inning
Andrew Benintendi's one-out single in the 10th inning scored Miguel Vargas for the winning run
Post-Match Reflections: White Sox interim manager Grady Sizemore emphasized the team's professionalism and focus despite fan frustration
Veteran left fielder Andrew Benintendi reflected on the team's resilience and determination to make the most of the remaining games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was significant as the White Sox avoided tying the 1962 Mets for the most single-season losses in the modern era
The White Sox were looking to build on their recent wins and prepare for a crucial series against the Detroit Tigers
